first_para: David John Barrington Burrowes (born 12 June 1969) is a British politician. He is the Conservative Member of Parliament for Enfield Southgate, Parliamentary Chairman of the Conservative Christian Fellowship, and an Officer of the Conservative Friends of Israel group.

full.extract: David John Barrington Burrowes (born 12 June 1969) is a British politician. He is the Conservative Member of Parliament for Enfield Southgate, Parliamentary Chairman of the Conservative Christian Fellowship, and an Officer of the Conservative Friends of Israel group.
full.title: David Burrowes
